project.name: Enterprise JavaBeans (EJB) 3.0
project.description: The Enterprise JavaBeans architecture is a component architecture for the development and deployment of component-based business applications. The purpose of Enterprise JavaBeans (EJB) 3.0 is to improve the EJB architecture by reducing its complexity from the developer's point of view.
